### Import data



```{r}
# install.packages("stdReg")

survey1$DHEA_new <- as.numeric(survey1$DHEA_new)


library(stdReg)
fit <- glm(formula = DunedinPACE ~ Decimal.Chronological.Age + BMI + Resveratrol_new + Main.Diet, family=gaussian, data=survey1)

std.fit <- stdGlm(fit=fit, data=survey1, X="DHEA_new")

summary(std.fit)

summary(object=std.fit, transform="odds", contrast="ratio", reference=0)

```
